entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 11:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4 except plus 1 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Snow inland late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow inland early in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 15 cm inland. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High plus 4 except plus 1 inland. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm except 50 mm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
